recipients.description: This is Email label recipient email address, shipment role, & language locale details. Atleast one entry must be specified.

emailAddress.description:
This is recipient email address for notifying the return label. Maximum length 200 characters.
Example: neena@abc.com

optionsRequested.description: These are to indicate how the email notifications for the pending shipment to be processed.

role.description: This is to specify Recipient role in the shipment.Shipment completor role is needed when we pass shipment initiator. We cannot use shipment initiator alone.

locale.description:
These are locale details.
Example: 'en_US'
click here to see locales
Note: If the locale is left blank or an invalid locale is entered, an error message is returned in response.

items.description: These are the recipient details for the online email return label.

message.description: This is an optional personalized message to be included in the email to the recipient.

description:
These are specific information about the pending email label.
Required when PendingShipmentType is EMAIL.
Not applicable for CreateTag.
